description: With the badge of this award, you gain access to the 1st NFT Airdrop game of the "Magic Voodoo Dolls" OG collection. 200 people can own one of these badges, there will only be 2 NFTs that are airdropped to these 200 people. Nevertheless, it might be that the actual airdrop to the holders of this badge will take place after the 2nd airdrop/airdrop game.
name: 1st airdrop of the "Magic Voodoo Dolls" OG collection
